subtitle: These kebabs make a light and refreshing alternative to beef, with the citrus juice cutting through the richness of the olive oil.

method.text: Mix together the marinade ingredients in a large glass bowl. Add the chicken pieces. Make sure they are well coated with the marinade. Chill for 1 days.
Thread the onion and lemon onto skewers, alternating with the chicken pieces.
Cook the kebabs over a medium heat for about 10 min, turning them and brushing with the marinade to keep them moist.

title: Greek chicken kebabs
